name: Daisy Whitman
location: Dino Dee-lite Motel, on a balcony
affiliation: Enclave Department of the Army(formerly)NovacEnclave remnants

topics.response_text: {at Bunker - no plan}I'm ready to fly once we've got a plan. Talk to Judah.
{pilot lingo - means watch your back}Watch your six out there.
{clarifying}Vertibird pilot. Seventy-one missions and only lost one chopper. Rotor malfunction over Klamath. Hard landing, but I walked away.

topics.topic_text: What do you do in Novac?
topics.response_text: I help folks strip down the more complicated bits of salvage they bring in - engines, mostly.

topics.topic_text: Did you fly for the NCR?
topics.response_text: "For?" No, not exactly. It was a long time ago. Things are a lot different these days, and those days are way behind me.

topics.topic_text: Arcade asked me to find you. I'm reuniting the Remnants, and they'll need your piloting skills.
topics.response_text: Told you everything about us, did he? Well, it's been a while since I've had my hands on the controls of a vertibird.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry I had to kill him - he didn't give me much choice.
topics.response_text: Well, anyway, Judah's given Orion's armor to you now. It'll take a few hours for me to show you how to use it properly, so let's get started.

topics.topic_text: Doesn't matter - he paid for his mistake.
How did you like flying vertibirds for the Enclave?
topics.response_text: {nostalgia}I never was happier than when I was in the cockpit. I was able to go just about anywhere and everywhere, limited only by the fuel I could carry.

conversation.response_text: {pilot lingo - means watch your back}Watch your six out there.

description:
Daisy Whitman is a 59 year-old Caucasian Female.

A former Enclave Vertibird pilot who now lives in Novac as a prospector and scavenger. Daisy is known for her love of flying and her close relationship with Arcade Gannon, whom she treats like a son.

Daisy Whitman's Personality: Adventurous, freedom-loving, and rebellious. Despite her age, she maintains independence and a passion for mechanics and scavenging. She's protective of those she cares about, especially Arcade.

Daisy Whitman's Backstory: Daisy Whitman served as a Vertibird pilot for the Enclave, flying over 71 missions under the command of Captain Judah Kreger during the time when the Enclave operated from their oil rig and Navarro base. Her passion for flying was so great that she often took 'scenic routes' back to base, risking her standing. She survived a Vertibird crash in Klamath that killed her two crew members. After the destruction of the Enclave oil rig in 2242 by the Chosen One and the subsequent fall of Navarro to the NCR, Daisy joined the remnants of Enclave forces, including Judah Kreger, Orion Moreno, and a young Arcade Gannon. They initially tried to integrate into NCR society but were forced to flee. Daisy eventually settled in the Mojave Wasteland, maintaining contact with Arcade and becoming a mother figure to him. By 2281, she has made a new life for herself in Novac, working as a prospector and helping others salvage engine parts.
